modName: Black Steel Plate Armor Re-texture - Female Version
summary: Black Steel Plate Armor Re-texture (Female Version)
descriptionHtml:
Black Steel Plate Armor Re-texture (Female Version)

This is a simple re-texture of Steel Plate (nord plate) armor gloves, boots, and the curiass. It isn\'t so dark that it looks out of place in game, but I think it gives a more \"sinister\" feel to your character. I made the mod for myself, but figured I\'d share in case someone else wants it.

The screenshot features my character wearing the armor and equipped with blades katanas.

To install, simply place the \"nordplate\" folder in skyrim/data/textures/armor/
To obtain in game type in these item codes in the console to get them using the player.additem command:  (i.e. type in \"player.additem 0001395D 1\" to get one set of gloves). 

Gloves = 0001395D
Boots = 0001395B
Chest piece = 0001395C 

Hope you enjoy.
author: rahv
